title: Perfect-Prime TH0160, USB Temperature & Humidity Data Logger Dewpoint Show, PC Software supports up to Win 10, Thermoemter/Hygrometer (No batteries included)
feature: Record 21,000 temperature and humidity counts simultaneously
description: Features and Specifications Temperature measurement range: - 40°C to 105°C Temperature measurement accuracy: ±1°C Temperature display resolution: 0.1°C Humidity measurement range: 0 to 100%RH Humidity measurement accuracy: ±3 % RH Humidity display resolution: 0.1% RH Operate/Storage temperature: - 40 to 105 °C Alarm display if user-defined maximum/minimum values are exceeded Select-able measure Interval: 1 second to 24 hours Record 21,000 temperature and humidity counts simultaneously LED Light indication Download collected data through PC's USB interface Software version for: Window 98/2000/XP/7/8/Vista/Win10 Analysis software used to view graph created from the recorded data Dew point indication via Windows control software. Software can be download on our website: https://perfect-prime.com/pages/downloads-perfectprime Battery: ER14250, 3.6V (not included )
